pages.text: You found my crystal. Use it well, for it can be powerful when it activates.

When The End was cursed, this crystal shielded me from being cursed with it. Of course, this itself was a curse in a way, forcing me to roam the desolate End islands eternally. At some point, I left this behind for the future hero of the world to use. Keep this item somewhere safe, for you $(thing)might need it at some point$() in the far future.
